name: Arthur Abon
text: It is also a f*d up reality when you read about a 5 month old baby (who most likely is unable to walk) getting shot because his dad supposedly fought back. The baby was probably lying down.    I begin to wonder where the Philippine collective soul went --   where our empathy and hearts have gone. When did we start being like this?
